entries.title: Russian Responsible for Building Kremlin's Naval Fleet Dies Suddenly

entries.title: Conservatives Outraged Joe Biden Didn't Say 'Jesus' in Christmas Message
entries.description: "If you're going to honor the birth of Jesus, you should mention his name," Father Gerald Murray of the Archdiocese of New York said.

entries.description: The unidentified candidate expressed outrage after losing the election, having come from a family with a long history in local government.

entries.description: "My parents who lived downstairs decided it was more fun to drink and have parties than help us with our children while I was struggling with the cancer."
